snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has agreed to cooperate with a biography written by Fredric U. Dicker, one of Albany’s longest tenured reporters.
abstract: Fredric U Dicker, state editor of the New York Post, announces that he is writing biography of New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo; spokesman for Cuomo says that the governor has agreed to cooperate with Dicker.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has agreed to cooperate with a biography written by Fredric U. Dicker, one of Albany’s longest tenured reporters.

headline.seo: Fredric Dicker to Write Andrew Cuomo Biography
headline.main: Want to Read Cuomo’s Story? Biographers Will Offer Options
headline.print_headline: Want to Read Cuomo’s Story? Biographers Will Offer Options
